languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, я прошу вас о помощи. Не только от лица еще не обоссавшихся от ужаса жителей станции, но и от лица Миссии Касбаллики. Мои люди и активы моей организации под ударом. Помогите нам защитить свои интересы, и {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}мы поможем вам{/d} защищать ваши".

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я прошу вас о помощи. Не только от лица еще не обоссавшихся от ужаса жителей станции, но и от лица Миссии Касбаллики. Мои люди и активы моей организации под ударом. Помогите нам защитить свои интересы, и {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}мы поможем вам{/d} защищать ваши".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not only on behalf of the not-yet-scared-shitless part of the station dwellers, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests and we'll help you protect yours."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not only on behalf of the not-yet-scared-shitless part of the station dwellers, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and we'll help you protect yours."

My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and we'll help you protect yours."

Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “大人，我希望能得到您的协助。我并非仅仅代表那些还没被吓得屁滚尿流的星站居民，也同样代表卡斯巴利卡集团。我的人民与我的组织的财产此刻处于危难之中。只要您帮助我们，保护我们的利益，那我们也{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}愿意帮助您{/d}，保护您的利益。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我希望能得到您的协助。我并非仅仅代表那些依然打算反抗的居民，也同样代表卡斯巴利卡集团。我的人民与我的组织的财产此刻不堪一击。只要您帮助我们，保护我们的利益，那我们也愿意帮助您，保护您的利益。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「陛下。あなたの助けが必要なんです。恐れ知らずのステーション住民たちの代表としてだけでなく、カスバリカ聖務団の代表としても。私の仲間と組織の資産は脆弱な立場にあります。資産を守るためにも手を貸してください。同じようにあなたの資産を守る{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}お手伝いをします{/d}から」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下。あなたの助けが必要なんです。恐れ知らずのステーション住民たちの代表としてだけでなく、カスバリカ聖務団の代表としても。私の仲間と組織の資産は脆弱な立場にあります。資産を守るためにも手を貸してください。同じようにあなたの資産を守る{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}お手伝いをします{/d}から」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, le pido ayuda. No solo en nombre de los habitantes de la estación que todavía no están acojonados, sino también en nombre de la Misión Kasballica. Mi gente y los bienes de mi organización se encuentran en una posición vulnerable. Ayúdenos a proteger nuestros intereses y {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}l{mf|e|a} ayudaremos{/d} a proteger los suyos».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, le pido ayuda. No solo en nombre de la parte no asustada de los habitantes de la estación, sino también en nombre de la Misión Kasballica. Mi gente y los bienes de mi organización se encuentran en una posición vulnerable. Ayúdenos a proteger nuestros intereses y le ayudaremos a proteger los suyos».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, ich bitte Euch um Eure Hilfe. Nicht nur im Namen des noch nicht völlig verängstigten Teils der Stationsbewohner, sondern auch im Namen der Kasballica-Mission. Die Mitglieder und der Besitz meiner Organisation sind in einer verletzlichen Position. Helft uns, unsere Interessen zu beschützen, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}dann helfen wir Euch{/d} , die Euren zu beschützen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, ich bitte Euch um Eure Hilfe. Nicht nur im Namen des noch nicht völlig verängstigten Teils der Stationsbewohner, sondern auch im Namen der Kasballica-Mission. Die Mitglieder und der Besitz meiner Organisation sind in einer verletzlichen Position. Helft uns, unsere Interessen zu beschützen, dann helfen wir Euch, die Euren zu beschützen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je vous demande votre aide ; non seulement pour les habitants de la station qui n'ont pas encore cédé à la terreur, mais aussi au nom de la Mission de la Kasballica. Mon organisation et ses ressources sont en mauvaise posture. Aidez-nous à protéger nos intérêts et {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}nous en ferons de même{/d} pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je vous demande votre aide ; non seulement pour les habitants de la station qui n'ont pas encore cédé à la terreur, mais aussi au nom de la Mission de la Kasballica. Mon organisation et ses ressources sont en mauvaise posture. Aidez-nous à protéger nos intérêts et nous en ferons de même pour vous. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, yardımınızı rica ediyorum. İstasyon nüfusunun korkudan altına sıçmayan kısmı da Kasballica Misyonu da bu arza taraftır. Halkımın ve örgütümün varlıkları tehlike altındadır. Çıkarlarımızı korumamıza yardımcı olun ki biz de sizinkileri {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}koruyabilelim{/d}."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, I'm asking you for help. Not just on behalf of the portion of the station population that isn't already scared shitless, but on behalf of the Kasballica Mission as well. My people and my organisation's assets are in a vulnerable position. Help us protect our interests, and {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}we'll help you{/d} protect yours."
